name: Welcome Series - New Customer
subject: Welcome to {{company_name}} - Let's get you started!
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Welcome to {{company_name}}! We're thrilled to have you join our community.

Here's what you can expect in the coming days:
‚Ä¢ A comprehensive onboarding guide
‚Ä¢ Tips to maximize your experience
‚Ä¢ Direct access to our support team

To get started, simply click the button below and we'll walk you through the setup process.

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us at support@company.com.

Best regards,
The {{company_name}} Team
preview: Welcome to our platform! We're excited to have you join our community and want to help you get started on the right foot...

name: Product Launch Announcement
subject: üöÄ Introducing {{product_name}} - The Future is Here!
body:
Dear {{first_name}},

We're excited to announce the launch of {{product_name}}, our most innovative solution yet!

After months of development and testing, we're proud to introduce features that will revolutionize how you:
‚Ä¢ Streamline your workflow
‚Ä¢ Boost productivity by 40%
‚Ä¢ Collaborate seamlessly with your team

üéâ SPECIAL LAUNCH OFFER üéâ
For the next 48 hours, get 30% off your first year with code LAUNCH30

Ready to experience the future? Click below to learn more.

Best,
{{sender_name}}
preview: We're thrilled to announce our latest product launch! Discover innovative features that will transform your workflow and boost productivity...

name: Follow-up After Meeting
subject: Great meeting you today, {{first_name}}!
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

It was wonderful meeting you today and discussing {{topic}}. I really enjoyed our conversation about {{specific_detail}}.

As promised, I'm attaching the resources we discussed:
‚Ä¢ {{resource_1}}
‚Ä¢ {{resource_2}}
‚Ä¢ {{resource_3}}

Next steps:
1. Review the attached materials
2. Schedule a follow-up call for next week
3. Connect with the relevant team members

Please let me know if you have any questions or need additional information.

Looking forward to our continued collaboration!

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}
preview: Thank you for the great meeting today! Here are the resources we discussed and our next steps moving forward...

name: Birthday Wishes
subject: üéâ Happy Birthday, {{first_name}}!
body:
Dear {{first_name}},

üéÇ Happy Birthday! üéÇ

On your special day, we want to take a moment to celebrate you and all the joy you bring to our community.

As a birthday gift from us, enjoy:
‚Ä¢ 20% off your next purchase with code BIRTHDAY20

The {{company_name}} Team üéà

name: Feedback Request
subject: How was your experience with {{company_name}}?
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

We hope you're enjoying your recent purchase from {{company_name}}!

Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us and helps us improve our products and services for everyone.

Would you mind taking 2 minutes to share your experience?

‚≠ê RATE YOUR EXPERIENCE
[5 STARS] [4 STARS] [3 STARS] [2 STARS] [1 STAR]

Your honest feedback helps us:
‚Ä¢ Improve our products
‚Ä¢ Enhance customer service
‚Ä¢ Better serve our community

As a thank you for your time, we'll send you a 10% discount code for your next purchase!

[LEAVE A REVIEW]

If you experienced any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team at {{support_email}}.

Thank you for being a valued customer!

Best regards,
The {{company_name}} Team
preview: We'd love to hear about your experience! Your feedback helps us improve and serve you better. Plus, get 10% off your next purchase...

name: Holiday Greetings
subject: Season's Greetings from {{company_name}}
body:
Dear {{first_name}},

As the holiday season approaches, we want to take a moment to express our heartfelt gratitude for your continued support and trust in {{company_name}}.

This year has been incredible, and none of it would have been possible without amazing customers like you.

As we look forward to the new year, we're excited to continue serving you with:
‚Ä¢ New products and features

Wishing you and your loved ones a wonderful holiday season filled with joy, peace, and prosperity.
